question: How can I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email address, and we will send you a link to set a new password.

question: How do I change my email address?
answer: You can update your email address by logging into your account, navigating to 'Settings' > 'Profile', and clicking 'Edit' next to your email.

question: Can I delete my account?
answer: Yes, you can request account deletion. Go to 'Settings' > 'Privacy' and click 'Delete Account'. Please note this action is permanent and cannot be undone.

question: Where can I view my billing history?
answer: Your billing history and past invoices are available in the 'Billing' section of your account dashboard.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), PayPal, and Google Pay. We do not accept cryptocurrency or checks.

question: How do I request a refund?
answer: Refunds can be requested within 14 days of purchase. Please contact our support team with your order ID to initiate the process.

question: Why is my account locked?
answer: Accounts are temporarily locked after 5 failed login attempts for security reasons. Please wait 30 minutes and try again, or reset your password.

question: Do you offer a free trial?
answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial for new users. You will not be charged if you cancel before the trial period ends.

question: How do I upgrade my subscription?
answer: To upgrade, go to the 'Subscription' tab in your dashboard and select the plan you wish to switch to. The changes will take effect immediately.

question: How do I contact human support?
answer: You can contact human support by emailing support@ourcompany.com or by calling 1-800-555-0199 between 9 AM and 5 PM EST.

question: Is my data secure?
answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption (AES-256) to protect your data. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

question: Can I share my account with others?
answer: Per our Terms of Service, accounts are for individual use only. Sharing credentials may lead to account suspension. We recommend our 'Team Plan' for multiple users.

question: The app is crashing on my phone, what should I do?
answer: Please ensure you have the latest version of the app installed. If the issue persists, try clearing the app cache or reinstalling the application.

question: Do you support Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)?
answer: Yes, we strongly recommend enabling 2FA. You can set it up in the 'Security' section of your account settings using SMS or an authenticator app.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: To cancel, go to 'Settings' > 'Billing' > 'Manage Subscription' and click 'Cancel'. You will retain access until the end of your current billing cycle.

question: What is the return policy for physical goods?
answer: Physical items can be returned within 30 days of receipt if they are unused and in original packaging. Return shipping fees may apply.

question: Why was my credit card declined?
answer: Cards are usually declined due to insufficient funds, incorrect billing address, or expiration. Please check your details or contact your bank.

question: Can I change my username?
answer: Usernames can be changed once every 30 days. Go to 'Profile Settings' to update your display name.

question: Where can I find the API documentation?
answer: Our developer API documentation is available at developer.ourcompany.com/docs. You will need an API key to make requests.

question: How do I report a bug?
answer: If you encounter a bug, please submit a report via our 'Feedback' form in the app footer, including screenshots and steps to reproduce the issue.
